TheMorph.definition: The fundamental unit of AI cinema. A zero-latency transition between two points in latent space.
TheMorph.operational_rule: Replace all instances of 'The Cut' or 'Jump Cut' with latent-space navigation.

EtherealMacroNaturalism.definition: A visual standard fusing hyper-photorealistic macro detail with stylized ethereal lighting.

DayemOner.definition: A continuous AI-generated shot traversing multiple scales (Macro to Wide) without temporal drift.

NeuralThespian.definition: An AI-native identity actor with fixed facial geometry and persistent vocal markers.
